body.name: 249 PCS STEM Learning Toys – Electric Drill DIY Educational Set, Creative Engineering with Various Shapes and 5 Toy Tools – 2&3D Mosaic Construction Kit for Toddlers, Boys and Girl Ages 3 4 5 6 7 8 9

features: Limitless Possibilities for Countless of Models : Mobius Educational Drill Building Playset gives your children the experience they deserve – with 249 pieces in a Variety of Shapes, your child can choose between squares, screws, triangles, circles and more, and develop their creativity by planning designs with our dazzling PASTEL COLORS, that spark the imagination & give an artistic touch to every model, whether from the 38+ DESIGNS FROM THE INCLUDED INSTRUCTIONS or from their very own minds

STEAM EDUCTION: Develops Creativity & Confidence - Learning through play has never been more engaging! It’s fun & easy to assemble the 38+ models in our instructions with the INCLUDED MECHANICAL SCREWDRIVER (2 AA batteries not included). The 38 models are just the beginning – let your kids’ imagination run wild and create their own one-of-a-kind designs. Feel the joy of seeing your kid successfully assemble a model. Mobius’ Creative Drilling Toy develops and enriches cognitive & motor skills

Enjoy Family Quality Time & Learn Together: With Mobius Mosaic Design Building Puzzle, your children and you can bond for hours – experience together the joy of turning the imagination into reality. Applying 4 different DIY Tools develops patience, precision & problem-solving skills, while nurturing artistic perception & conceptual understanding of form and function. Assemble models as: Tree, Lion, Excavator, Robot, Train, Plane, Helicopter, Horse – Invent and Innovate for an unlimited time

GIFT THAT EVERY CHILD WILL CHERISH: Astounding Pastel colors, shapes & models that mesmerize and everyone loves. Plus, you get a STORAGE BOX, helping you organize the pieces together & making your life much simpler. With Mobius’ children-friendly round edges, your children are safe. Quality durable materials that will withstand countless hours of playing

At MOBIUS Toys, we will do whatever it takes to make you thrilled with your purchase. Our awesome STEM Construction Engineering Building Blocks arrives in a One-of-a-Kind Gift Box, for kids 3 4 5 6 7 8 years old. Because we’re so confident in the quality of our toys, we give you a 2 YEAR MANUFACTURER WARRANTY

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mechanial Screwdriver + DIY tools! Our Educational Building Kit comes with a kids' friendly mechanical screwdriver and all the DIY tools needed, enabling kids to build creative models like no one else Unique DIY Experience A storage box included, helping you organize the pieces together & making your life much simpler Step-By-Step Instructions Kids can easily assemble 38 models with the included instruction manual or they can build something magical from their very own minds

Promote Creativity Providing kids with techniques for exploring and discovering interesting concepts opening up a new world of possibilities! Build Fine Motor Skills By building and creating different designs, kids improve their cognition and fine motor skills while playing and having fun Object Awareness Gain an understanding of spatial awareness and interaction through active object exploration. Active exploration develops coordination, self-confidence and cognitive thinking skills Practice Real Life Skills Our toys ignite curiosity, create understanding and promotes the development of real-world skills!

MOBIUS Educational Drill Building Playset gives your children the experience they deserve! 249 pieces in a Variety of Shapes, your child can choose between squares, screws, triangles, circles and more, and develop their creativity. Easily assemble 38+ 2D and 3D models with the included step-by-step guide. We, as parents, are committed to providing them with the right tools to do so. Buyers Trust the MOBIUS Brand for our Dedicated to the Highest Quality Products and Fanatical Customer Support. Your ABSOLUTE SATISFACTION is our primary objective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a Christmas gift…I’m sure he will love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my nephew. It was a great buy for him. He was occupied for a long time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a 4 year olds birthday, his mom said he loved it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift for my turning-6 grandson who loves to put things together, and it is a big hit! 8-year-old sister also was pleased, saying, "We have that at school in STEM class!", Would definitely recommend. It's also nice that at cleanup time all the pieces go into the case!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars He loved his present 🎁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tools to big for younger children
reviews.reviewText: This toy was a gift for my almost 3 year old. My son is really tall for his age and has huge hands, however, the handle drill/screwdriver is way to thick for him to hold it with one hand while pressing the buttons for it to turn. Also, the buttons are rather hard to push. He ha to use both hands and press really hard on them.The screws go easily in and out of the white box. Unfortunately, they don’t seem to be very sturdy, as I found several of them broken apart.That being said, my son enjoys playing with this tool box every once in a while and that is what matters most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 3 yr old granddaughter and she loves it. She spent a good hour just screwing in the screws and was so proud and excited with each one. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for girls and boys
reviews.reviewText: Great STEM learning toy for my4-1/2 year old twin grandchildren. (Boy and Girl) They love it. Learning to use the drill and screwdriver. Hours of fun. So glad I found this!!
